title: Indix
description: Your privacy is important to Indix Corporation ("Indix"). This privacy policy ("Policy") applies to the Indix Web sites ("Sites"), downloadable applications (“Applications”), Indix services provided through use of the Indix API, as well as information which you may transmit to Indix (via a Site, the API, or via another Indix service), all referred to herein as “Indix Services.” This Policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and disclosed by Indix.
